title: Invoker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, use the Chains of Corax to occupy a target player tonight. You have 3 uses of this ability.
- At night, use the Strings of Mithras to redirect a target player to another tonight. You have 2 uses of this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role is converted from Town Support members that are roleblock and/or redirect immune.
- This role is roleblock and redirect immune.

desc:

You may only perform one ability per phase.
